--- title: "Untitled" format: html toc: true editor: visual --- ## Início ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} require(glarma) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Carregando pacotes exigidos: glarma ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} require(MASS) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Carregando pacotes exigidos: MASS ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} require(performance) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Carregando pacotes exigidos: performance ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} require(Hmisc) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Carregando pacotes exigidos: Hmisc ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Anexando pacote: 'Hmisc' ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Os seguintes objetos são mascarados por 'package:base': format.pval, units ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} require(kableExtra) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Carregando pacotes exigidos: kableExtra ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} require(tidyverse) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Carregando pacotes exigidos: tidyverse ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` ── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ── ✔ dplyr 1.1.4 ✔ readr 2.1.5 ✔ forcats 1.0.0 ✔ stringr 1.5.1 ✔ ggplot2 3.5.1 ✔ tibble 3.2.1 ✔ lubridate 1.9.3 ✔ tidyr 1.3.1 ✔ purrr 1.0.2 ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ✖ dplyr::group_rows() masks kableExtra::group_rows() ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() ✖ dplyr::select() masks MASS::select() ✖ dplyr::src() masks Hmisc::src() ✖ dplyr::summarize() masks Hmisc::summarize() ℹ Use the conflicted package () to force all conflicts to become errors ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} df <- read.delim("Data_CPDO.txt") ``` ::: ## Matrix of Correlation ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} a <- df[, 1:9] matrix <- rcorr(as.matrix(a)) cor_matrix <- matrix$r p_value_matrix <- matrix$P cor_matrix[lower.tri(cor_matrix, diag = TRUE)] <- "" p_value_matrix[lower.tri(p_value_matrix, diag = TRUE)] <- "" ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} cor_matrix %>% kable("html", align = "c") %>% kable_styling() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}

````` ::: ::: ## NO ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} y <- df[,1] X1 <- as.matrix(df[,4]) Trend <- 1:84 Intercepto <- rep(1,84) X1 <- cbind(Intercepto, Trend, X1, df$cos6, df$cos12, df$sen6, df$sen12) colnames(X1) <- c("Intercepto", "Trend", "NO", "cos6", "cos12", "sen6", "sen12") ``` ::: ### GLARMA Poisson ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} glarma_poi <- glarma(y, X1, thetaLags = NULL, phiLags = 1, type = "Poi", method = "FS", residuals= "Pearson", maxit = 100, grad = 1e-6) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} summary(glarma_poi) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Call: glarma(y = y, X = X1, type = "Poi", method = "FS", residuals = "Pearson", phiLags = 1, thetaLags = NULL, maxit = 100, grad = 1e-06) Pearson Residuals: Min 1Q Median 3Q Max -4.475 -1.428 -0.130 1.112 8.618 GLARMA Coefficients: Estimate Std.Error z-ratio Pr(>|z|) phi_1 0.07613 0.00524 14.53 <2e-16 *** Linear Model Coefficients: Estimate Std.Error z-ratio Pr(>|z|) Intercepto 3.175674 0.063969 49.644 < 2e-16 *** Trend 0.007152 0.001026 6.972 3.12e-12 *** NO 0.025515 0.002818 9.053 < 2e-16 *** cos6 -0.111946 0.030222 -3.704 0.000212 *** cos12 -0.403275 0.037764 -10.679 < 2e-16 *** sen6 -0.374332 0.031790 -11.775 < 2e-16 *** sen12 0.489579 0.035256 13.886 < 2e-16 *** Null deviance: 2279.04 on 83 degrees of freedom Residual deviance: 358.88 on 76 degrees of freedom AIC: 837.7817 Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 17 LRT and Wald Test: Alternative hypothesis: model is a GLARMA process Null hypothesis: model is a GLM with the same regression structure Statistic p-value LR Test 144.5 <2e-16 *** Wald Test 211.1 <2e-16 *** --- Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} glarma_poi ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Call: glarma(y = y, X = X1, type = "Poi", method = "FS", residuals = "Pearson", phiLags = 1, thetaLags = NULL, maxit = 100, grad = 1e-06) GLARMA Coefficients: phi_1 0.0761298 Linear Model Coefficients: Intercepto Trend NO cos6 cos12 3.175673916 0.007151945 0.025514542 -0.111945802 -0.403275442 sen6 sen12 -0.374332324 0.489578673 Degrees of Freedom: 83 Total (i.e. Null); 76 Residual Null Deviance: 2279.037 Residual Deviance: 358.8828 AIC: 837.7817 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} par(mfrow = c(2, 1)) acf(glarma_poi$residuals) pacf(glarma_poi$residuals) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](relatorio_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} par(mfrow=c(2,3)) plot(glarma_poi) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} "NegBin", method = "FS", residuals= "Pearson", maxit = 100, grad = 1e-6) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} summary(glarma_nb) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Call: glarma(y = y, X -0.065614 0.060498 -1.085 0.27812 cos12 -0.454707 0.073249 -6.208 5.38e-10 *** sen6 -0.315997 0.056916 -5.552 2.82e-08 *** sen12 0.466171 0.063349 7.359 1.86e-13 *** Null deviance: 361.607 on 83
